content: I was just curious if anyone out there has heard anything about how many Hospital Corpsman are going to be promoted from E6 to E7? Every year the rumor mills flies about this, until the boards come out, but I haven't heard a word this year. Makes me a little worried, since my hubby is up for Chief this year. Just curious. Thanks, AJ
